location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Captain Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs Captain Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Bussora [Basra], that in a day or two he will be leaving Bushire for a tour of the Arabian coast. Stannus states that the Assistant Surgeon, James Pringle Riach, will be charge of the Residency during his absence.
